long_description: The Rocky Mounts TieRod Bike Mount is designed to fit all factory crossbars with minimal installation-and comes in a wide choice of colors so you can match it to your car or bike. Fits elliptical crossbars like a glove and is specifically designed for the pre-installed factory racks on cars and SUVs. Includes rubber-coated stainless-steel straps that snug tight and cradle the crossbars. Stainless-steel quick release is simple to operate and securely attaches the bike to the rack. Fits bikes with or without disc brakes. Ratcheting wheel strap secures the rear wheel. The Rocky Mounts TieRod Bike Mount is lockable with Rocky Mounts lock cores (sold separately).
short_description: The Rocky Mounts TieRod Bike Mount is designed to fit all factory crossbars with minimal installation-and comes in a wide choice of colors so you can match it to your car or bike.
